title: The Midnight Library
author: Matt Haig
thoughts: Made me reflect on choices and quiet regrets. Slow but meaningful.

title: It Ends With Us
author: Colleen Hoover
thoughts: Emotionally heavy. Appreciated the honesty but needed breaks while reading.

title: Before the Coffee Gets Cold
author: Toshikazu Kawaguchi
thoughts: Short, gentle, and quietly emotional. Loved the concept.
